sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas id="myChart"></canvas>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'chart',
    data() {
      return {
        initialChartData: {
          labels: ['july'],
          datasets: [
            {
              label: 'Sales per Month',
              data: [1],
              backgroundColor: [
                'rgb(255, 99, 132)',
                'rgb(54, 162, 235)',
                'rgb(255, 205, 86)',
              ],
              borderColor: [
                'rgb(255, 99, 132)',
                'rgb(54, 162, 235)',
                'rgb(255, 205, 86)',
              ],
              borderWidth: 1,
            },
          ],
        },
      };
    },
    mounted() {
      const ctx = document.getElementById('myChart').getContext('2d');
      const myChart = new Chart(ctx, {
        type: 'bar',
        data: this.initialChartData,
        options: {
          scales: {
            yAxes: [
              {
                ticks: {
                  beginAtZero: true,
                },
              },
            ],
          },
        },
      });
    },
  };
  </script>
